hero.description: Modern residential and commercial interiors. Unique approach, support and turnkey implementation.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: CIRCLE is an interior design and implementation studio. We create thoughtful residential and commercial spaces â€” from concept to full turnkey implementation.
about.paragraph2: Each project is handled by a team of professionals for whom design is not just a job, but a constant process of exploration, development and precision in details.

benefits.row1Text: We manage projects from drawings and sketches to finished interiors and furnishing.
benefits.row2Text: We don't draw 'pictures', we create living spaces for your life scenarios.
benefits.row3Text: We provide a complete package of clear, accurate and professional technical drawings for builders

econom.name: Econom

business.name: Business
details: Layout solution with furniture arrangement up to 10 options

premium.name: Premium
